img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(90\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/01/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2890%29.png)
In the distance, you'll see more Revenants and a Bull Guard by an altar, where there are green Wisps to collect. Clear the area and absorb the Wisps, then go back up to where you fought the Father of Stones.
img_below_text:
You'll see a door on the left, near hanging yellow fabric. Open this, and head down the stairs toward the statue. The health bar for the Gray-Bronze Cart will appear, but you don't need to worry about fighting it just yet.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(94\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f6/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2894%29.png)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(90\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/01/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2890%29.png)
In the distance, you'll see more Revenants and a Bull Guard by an altar, where there are green Wisps to collect. Clear the area and absorb the Wisps, then go back up to where you fought the Father of Stones."
        - Following Text: "You'll see a door on the left, near hanging yellow fabric. Open this, and head down the stairs toward the statue. The health bar for the Gray-Bronze Cart will appear, but you don't need to worry about fighting it just yet.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(94\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f6/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2894%29.png)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a player character standing near a large door in a walled area, with an arrow pointing toward the door as the next objective. The surrounding environment is desolate, featuring barren trees, rocky terrain, and a stone pillar. This scene serves as a visual cue for progressing in the walkthrough, directing the player to open the door and descend the stairs toward the next encounter involving the Gray-Bronze Cart.
